scripts.frontend:build: yarn --cwd frontend --frozen-lockfile --silent install && yarn --cwd frontend build
scripts.frontend:test: yarn --cwd frontend --frozen-lockfile --silent install && yarn --cwd frontend test
scripts.frontend:test:watch: yarn --cwd frontend --frozen-lockfile --silent install && yarn --cwd frontend test:watch
scripts.frontend:sut: yarn --cwd frontend --frozen-lockfile --silent install && yarn --cwd frontend dev
scripts.backend:test: backend/gradlew -p backend testDBMigrate -Dspring.profiles.active=test && backend/gradlew -p backend test --build-cache --parallel
scripts.test: yarn frontend:build && run-p -clnr start:mb sut cy:run
scripts.test:dev: yarn frontend:build && run-p -clnr start:mb sut frontend:sut cy:run
scripts.test:open: yarn run-p -clnr start:mb sut frontend:sut cy:open
scripts.lint:all: yarn && yarn backend:lint && yarn frontend:lint && yarn cy:lint
scripts.format:all: yarn && yarn backend:format && yarn frontend:format && yarn cy:format

frontend:format.command: yarn --cwd frontend --frozen-lockfile --silent install && yarn --cwd frontend lint --fix

frontend:lint.command: yarn --cwd frontend --frozen-lockfile --silent install && yarn --cwd frontend lint
